Allows customizing the address bar to display at the top or bottom. Default is bottom. You can change it in Settings -> Address Bar. This feature is only supported on iPhone and iPod devices (with a screen size of 4 inches or more), not on iPad devices, bringing a new experience to users.

Allows customizing the display of the address bar to the bottom on iPad devices. Default is bottom. You can change it in Settings -> Address Bar, giving a new user experience.

Allows to hide the toolbar while browsing the web. This feature is very useful when users need to display fullscreen mode. Enable it from Share -> Hide Toolbar.
